General.Name: Helix Wind Corp
General.Description: Helix Wind, Corp., a renewable energy company, designs, manufactures, and sells small wind energy systems for small businesses and homeowners. The company's wind energy systems consist of a single turbine with a capacity of 400 watts to 500 kilowatts. Its products include savonius VAWT turbines and WTMS monitoring systems. The company is based in Poway, California.
General.Address: 13125 Danielson Street, Poway, CA, United States, 92064
